problem_text: In Fig. 22-66, particle 1 (of charge $+1.00 \mu \mathrm{C}$ ), particle 2 (of charge $+1.00 \mu \mathrm{C})$, and particle 3 (of charge $Q$ ) form an equilateral triangle of edge length $a$. For what value of $Q$ (both sign and magnitude) does the net electric field produced by the particles at the center of the triangle vanish?
